en.name: LAR Grizzly 50 Mark V .50 AE pistol
en.description: The LAR Grizzly Mark V pistol is a modified Colt M1911 style pistol with oversized components designed to handle larger, more powerful cartridges than could be used in the standard-size 1911 pistol; in this case, .50 Action Express. The original prototype built by Perry Arnett was made from two Colt 1911 frames and slides cut and welded to accommodate the .45 Winchester Magnum round, with two steel doubler plates welded to the slide flats to retard the action and increase strength.
